title: Kindred Spirits
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>....and it’s like that. If you can do what I just said, I think you can straighten out the part you’re stumbling on, Shioriko<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I see.... I hadn’t thought of that approach. Thank you so much, Umi-san. I’d like to give it a try<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Then, are you prepared for it....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes! I’ll be in your care for the strategy of building our strength by mountain climbing in the winter!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Uuuu.... My dream is finally coming true....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Mountain climbing during the winter is lonely. But the gorgeous view of the scenery you get more than makes up for it.... Thinking I can finally realize that is moving me to tears....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Umm, we are doing it to build our strength, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>T-, that’s right! Of course! It puts a load on you, it can enlarge your lung capacity, and it can train your legs, back, and spirit! It’s the perfect way to build your strength!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>So you can train everything, huh. I’ll be doing my best, so please take care of me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
